summary: Web app Personal Finance Management (bahasa Indonesia) dengan UI fintech premium: dashboard visual, transaksi (CRUD, filter, upload bukti), kalender, analisis cashflow otomatis, manajemen kategori, serta autentikasi. Dibangun dengan stack platform (Motoko backend + React/TypeScript frontend + Internet Identity) dan penyimpanan di canister.
architectural_notes: Gunakan stack bawaan platform: backend Motoko (canister) + frontend React/TypeScript.
Penyimpanan data (users/categories/transactions) dan upload bukti transaksi disimpan di canister (blob/asset) dengan batas file 5MB.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity authentication and per-user access control so that all finance data (categories, transactions, receipts, analytics) is isolated by the authenticated principal, with a clear logged-in/logged-out state in the UI.

Implement receipt image upload and retrieval stored in-canister: accept JPG/PNG up to 5MB, store the binary data and a stable identifier/reference on the transaction, and provide endpoints to fetch a thumbnail-sized rendition and the full image.

Build the Transactions experience: a modern form to add/edit income and expense transactions (type, category dropdown, auto currency formatting for amount, date, note, optional receipt), plus a transactions table/list with edit/delete, pagination, search, filters, and sorting.

Create the Dashboard page that visualizes the user’s current financial snapshot: current balance, total income this month, total expense this month, net cashflow this month, a quick-add transaction action, charts (income vs expense bar chart, expense category distribution pie chart, 6-month cashflow trend line chart), and a warning when expenses exceed income for the current month.

Implement the Transaction Calendar page: a monthly calendar view where each day shows total income and total expense for that date, with green/red visual dominance, a monthly summary section, and click-on-day to view the list of that day’s transactions.

Implement automatic cashflow analysis and insights calculated from the user’s transactions: average monthly income, average monthly expense, month-over-month change insights, largest expense category for the current month, a simple end-of-month balance forecast, and a health indicator (Safe/Warning/Overspending) displayed with modern badges/progress visuals.
Build Category Management UI: list categories by type (income/expense), add/edit/delete categories, and allow selecting a color and optional icon field.

Apply a premium fintech visual design consistently across the app: modern clean minimal layout, deep navy/dark blue primary with emerald green secondary and soft gradient accents, rounded cards, soft shadows with light glassmorphism, responsive mobile-first behavior, smooth transitions/animations, collapsible sidebar navigation, and a working light/dark mode toggle.
Ensure all user-facing UI copy is in Indonesian across the application (navigation, labels, buttons, empty states, validation errors, and notifications).

new_feature_requests.summary: UI/UX fintech premium (clean, glassmorphism ringan, responsive mobile-first, animasi halus), sidebar collapsible, toggle dark/light mode, bahasa Indonesia
Authentication & security dengan Internet Identity (login/logout) dan proteksi akses per-user
Dashboard ringkasan keuangan: saldo, pemasukan/pengeluaran bulan ini, selisih cashflow, quick add, notifikasi jika pengeluaran > pemasukan, serta grafik (bar/pie/line)
Manajemen transaksi pemasukan/pengeluaran: tambah/edit/hapus, form (kategori, nominal currency, tanggal, catatan), pagination, search, filter (tanggal/kategori/jenis), sorting
Upload bukti transaksi (JPG/PNG) dengan preview, batas 5MB, simpan blob di canister + path/identifier, thumbnail list & modal preview full image
Kalender transaksi bulanan: total pemasukan/pengeluaran per tanggal, warna hijau/merah, klik tanggal tampil daftar transaksi, summary bulanan
Analisis cashflow otomatis: rata-rata bulanan, insight (kenaikan/penurunan, kategori terbesar), forecast saldo akhir bulan, health indicator (Aman/Waspada/Boros) dengan indikator modern
Manajemen kategori per user: tambah/edit/hapus, type income/expense, warna, icon (opsional)

Create the backend data model and persistence in the single Motoko actor to support: categories (income/expense, name, color, optional icon) and transactions (type, category, amount, date, note, optional receipt reference), including full CRUD operations and queries needed by the UI (list with pagination, search, filters, sorting).
